## NS.sqlinject() method

Runs SQLInject.exe on a server.

**Signature:**

```typescript
sqlinject(host: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  host | string | Hostname of the target server. |

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

RAM cost: 0.05 GB

## Example 1


```ts
// NS1:
sqlinject("foodnstuff");
```

## Example 2


```ts
// NS2:
ns.sqlinject("foodnstuff");
```
